hero_image.title: Hero image - Performance Media Dashboard
hero_image.description: Minimalistyczna kompozycja z laptopem pokazującym dashboard Performance Media z metrykami ROAS i konwersji
hero_image.alt_text: Dashboard Performance Media z metrykami ROAS, CPA i wykresami konwersji na laptopie
hero_image.prompt: Clean minimalist workspace flat lay view, laptop displaying performance marketing dashboard with ROAS charts, conversion metrics, and campaign data, white wooden desk, smartphone, yellow notebook with black pen, coffee cup, natural daylight from side, muted colors black white gray with subtle yellow accents, professional business aesthetic, high quality, sharp focus, no people

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Modern workspace, flat lay perspective, marketing dashboard visible, professional setting

section_media.title: Porównanie tradycyjnej reklamy vs Performance Media
section_media.description: Wykres porównawczy pokazujący różnice między tradycyjnym marketingiem a Performance Media
section_media.alt_text: Wykres porównania tradycyjnej reklamy vs Performance Media - płatności i rezultaty
section_media.prompt: Clean comparison infographic showing traditional advertising vs performance media, two columns with icons and metrics, CPM vs CPA comparison, professional design with black gray and yellow accents, minimalist business style, clear typography

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean comparison design, two-column layout, professional business colors

section_media.title: Mapa kanałów Performance Media
section_media.description: Infografika pokazująca główne kanały Performance Media z ikonami i charakterystykami
section_media.alt_text: Infografika kanałów Performance Media: Google Ads, Facebook, programmatic, affiliate
section_media.prompt: Circular infographic showing performance media channels: Google Ads, Facebook Ads, programmatic, affiliate marketing, retargeting. Each channel with distinct icon and key characteristics, connected with subtle lines, professional design with black white gray colors and yellow highlights, clean modern style

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Circular or hub-and-spoke design showing interconnected marketing channels

section_media.title: Lejek planowania kampanii Performance Media
section_media.description: Diagram lejka pokazujący etapy planowania od celów biznesowych do optymalizacji
section_media.alt_text: Lejek planowania kampanii Performance Media - od celów do optymalizacji w 5 etapach
section_media.prompt: Marketing funnel diagram showing 5 stages of performance media campaign planning: business goals, KPIs, targeting, creative content, optimization. Clean funnel shape with icons for each stage, arrows showing flow, professional colors black white gray with yellow accents

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Vertical funnel with clear stages, professional business infographic style

section_media.title: Dashboard Google Analytics 4 z metrykami Performance
section_media.description: Mockup dashboardu Google Analytics 4 pokazującego kluczowe metryki Performance Media
section_media.alt_text: Dashboard Google Analytics 4 z metrykami CPA, ROAS i conversion rate
section_media.prompt: Clean mockup of Google Analytics 4 dashboard interface showing performance media metrics: CPA, ROAS, conversion rates, attribution modeling. Professional UI design, realistic but clean interface, highlighted key metrics, modern dashboard aesthetic

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean dashboard interface, focus on metrics and charts, professional software UI

section_media.title: Infografika najczęstszych błędów w Performance Media
section_media.description: Infografika przedstawiająca 5 najkosztowniejszych błędów w Performance Media z ikonami ostrzeżeń
section_media.alt_text: 5 najczęstszych błędów w Performance Media - tracking, metryki, testowanie
section_media.prompt: Warning-style infographic showing 5 common performance media mistakes: poor tracking, wrong metrics optimization, rushed A/B testing, ignoring seasonality, channel silos. Red warning icons, clear typography, professional design with black white and red accent colors

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Warning/alert style with red accents, clear numbered list format

section_media.section: Sekcja: Trendy i przyszłość Performance Media
section_media.title: Wykres trendów w Performance Media 2024-2025
section_media.description: Wykres liniowy pokazujący trendy w Performance Media: cookieless, AI, privacy-first
section_media.alt_text: Trendy Performance Media: wzrost cookieless marketing i AI w optymalizacji kampanii
section_media.prompt: Modern line chart showing performance media trends 2024-2025: cookieless marketing growth, AI optimization adoption, privacy-first strategies. Clean design with multiple trend lines, professional colors, futuristic tech aesthetic with subtle gradients

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Modern, tech-forward design with clean lines and futuristic feel
